title: Carlotta Walls LaNier Civil Rights Advocacy Award Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards to students in the College of Arts and Sciences Department of Ethnic Studies; intent is support for students with an interest in and commitment to civil and human rights.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards to students in the College of Arts and Sciences Department of Ethnic Studies; intent is support for students with an interest in and commitment to civil and human rights.
